title: nn.ConstantPad2d Not working correct! NotImplementedError: Only 4D and 5D padding is supported for now
body_html:
I installed pytorch using pip

I noticed that for the following code I receive error:

import torch.nn as nn
import torch.nn.functional as F
from torch.autograd import Variable
from torch import autograd

input = autograd.Variable(torch.randn(3, 3))

m = nn.ConstantPad2d((1,1,1,1), 0)
output = m(input)
print(output)

NotImplementedError: Only 4D and 5D padding is supported for now

Though some people mentioned it works if you install pytorch using the source, it is not working yet when I install pytorch using pip

Please fix this issue

body:
I installed pytorch using pip

I noticed that  for the following code I receive error:

```
import torch.nn as nn
import torch.nn.functional as F
from torch.autograd import Variable
from torch import autograd

input = autograd.Variable(torch.randn(3, 3))

m = nn.ConstantPad2d((1,1,1,1), 0)
output = m(input)
print(output)
```

NotImplementedError: Only 4D and 5D padding is supported for now

Though some people mentioned it works if you install pytorch using the source, it is not working yet when I install pytorch using pip

Please fix this issue
